name: @invertase/react-native-admob
author: Invertase <oss@invertase.io> (http://invertase.io)
description: React Native AdMob is an easy way to monetize mobile apps with targeted, in-app advertising.

scripts.prepare: cd example && yarn && cd ios && (pod install || true) && cd ../.. && yarn build
scripts.lint:code: yarn lint:js && yarn lint:android && yarn lint:ios:check
scripts.lint:spellcheck: spellchecker --quiet --files="docs/**/*.md" --dictionaries="./.spellcheck.dict.txt" --reports="spelling.json" --plugins spell indefinite-article repeated-words syntax-mentions syntax-urls frontmatter
scripts.lint: yarn lint:code && yarn lint:markdown:check && yarn lint:spellcheck && yarn tsc:compile
scripts.tests:android:build: cd example && yarn detox build --configuration android.emu.debug
scripts.tests:android:build-release: cd example && yarn detox build --configuration android.emu.release
scripts.tests:android:test: cd example && yarn detox test --configuration android.emu.debug
scripts.tests:android:test:debug: cd example && yarn detox test --configuration android.emu.debug --inspect
scripts.tests:android:test-reuse: cd example && yarn detox test --configuration android.emu.debug --reuse
scripts.tests:android:test-cover: cd example && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc yarn detox test --loglevel trace --configuration android.emu.debug
scripts.tests:android:test-cover-reuse: cd example && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc yarn detox test --configuration android.emu.debug --reuse
scripts.tests:ios:build: cd example && yarn detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug
scripts.tests:ios:build-release: cd example && yarn detox build --configuration ios.sim.release
scripts.tests:ios:test: cd example && yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --loglevel warn
scripts.tests:ios:test:debug: cd example && yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --loglevel warn --inspect
scripts.tests:ios:test-reuse: cd example && yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --reuse --loglevel warn
scripts.tests:ios:test-cover: cd example && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug
scripts.tests:ios:test-cover-reuse: cd example && node_modules/.bin/nyc yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --reuse --loglevel warn
scripts.tests:ios:pod:install: cd example && cd ios && rm -rf ReactNativeFirebaseDemo.xcworkspace && rm -f Podfile.lock && pod install --repo-update && cd ..
